item.title: Neural Networks and Deep Learning: Week 1
item.description: Introduction to Deep Learning Link to heading This is the first course in the Coursera’s Deep Learning Specialization. I will try to summarize the major topics presented in each of the weeks in each course in a series of posts. The purpose of this is to both deepen my own understanding by explaining, but also for people who have not taken the specialization. Hopefully these posts will inspire you to do so.
